fw.name: TopologicalOperators
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

class.name: CATBodyChecker
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to check a given body.

method.name: BeginningDiagnosis
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the resulting diagnosis.

method.name: Check
method.abstract: Checks a given body.

method.name: Create
method.abstract: Constructs an operator that checks a body.

method.name: Dump
method.abstract: Gets all the diagnoses of <tt>this</tt> operator results after run.

method.name: GetCheckMode
method.abstract: Gets the active check mode of the operator.

method.name: GetDiagnosis
method.abstract: Gets the current diagnosis of <tt>this</tt> operator results.

method.name: GetNbDiagnoses
method.abstract: Gets the number of diagnoses found after the operator run.

method.name: NextDiagnosis
method.abstract: Skips to the next diagnosis of <tt>this</tt> operator results, if any.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes an operator from memory after use.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetCheckCells
method.abstract: Sets the check cells for the operator.

method.name: SetCheckMode
method.abstract: Sets the new active check mode of the operator.

method.name: SetCheckRules
method.abstract: Sets the check rules for the operator.

method.name: Type
method.abstract: Type of <tt>this</tt> operator.

enum.name: CheckMode
enum.abstract:
enum CATBodyChecker::CheckMode
Defines Check Mode for the body check operation.

enum.name: CheckRuleID
enum.abstract:
enum CATBodyChecker::CheckRuleID
Defines Check Rules for the body check operation.

class.name: CATCloseOperator
class.abstract: Class representing the operator that closes a skin body.

method.name: GetBooleanResult
method.abstract: Returns the body created from the Boolean operation between a given body and the thickened body.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the resulting body of the closure operation.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs the operator.

method.name: SetBooleanOperation
method.abstract: Asks for a boolean operation with the output of the operator (the so called closed skin) and <tt>iOperandBody</tt>.

class.name: CATDynBoolean
class.abstract: Class defining the boolean operations on skins and solids.

method.name: NoSimplif
method.abstract: Defines a mode such that the resulting body is not simplified.

method.name: SetContactFacesForUnion
method.abstract: Defines an upper set of faces that are touched by the operation.

class.name: CATDynChamfer
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to chamfer edges of a 3D body or a skin body.

method.name: Append
method.abstract: Appends a ribbon to <tt>this</tt> chamfering operator.

method.name: SetPrevisualizationOnly
method.abstract: Asks for the computation of the construction paths of the chamfer, even though the chamfering operation cannot be completely run.

method.name: SetTrueMultiRibbonOnly
method.abstract: Defines the type of computation in case of multi ribbons configurations.

class.name: CATDynDraft
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to draft faces of a 3D body.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Adds a domain to draft.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Defines the parting element associated with <tt>this</tt> drafting operator.

method.name: SetJunctionMode
method.abstract: Defines whether a draft ribbon can be branched into two ribbons.

method.name: SetPrevisualizationOnly
method.abstract: Asks for the computation of the construction paths of the draft.

class.name: CATDynFillet
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to fillet edges or faces of a 3D body or a skin body.

method.name: Append
method.abstract: Appends a ribbon along an edge.

method.name: Append
method.abstract: Appends a ribbon between two faces.

method.name: Append
method.abstract: Appends a tri-tangent ribbon.

method.name: SetHelpPoint
method.abstract: When several ribbons are possible in a FaceFace Fillet, allows you to choose a help point to specify the edge where the ribbon must be computed.

method.name: SetPrevisualizationOnly
method.abstract: Asks for the computation of the construction paths of the fillet, even though the filleting operation cannot be completely run.

method.name: SetTrueMultiRibbonOnly
method.abstract: Defines the type of computation in case of multi ribbons configurations.

class.name: CATDynMassProperties3D
class.abstract: Class representing the operator that computes geometric characteristics of a body , a face or a edge.

method.name: GetCenterOfGravity
method.abstract: Returns the center of gravity of the analyzed body.

method.name: GetCenterOfGravityRelativeError
method.abstract: Returns an estimation of the center of gravity relative error.

method.name: GetInertiaMatrix
method.abstract: Returns the inertia matrix of the analyzed body.

method.name: GetLength
method.abstract: Returns the length of the analyzed body.

method.name: GetVolume
method.abstract: Returns the volume of the analyzed body.

method.name: GetVolumeRelativeError
method.abstract: Returns an estimation of the volume relative error.

method.name: GetWetArea
method.abstract: Returns the surface of the analyzed body.

method.name: GetWetAreaRelativeError
method.abstract: Returns an estimation of the wet area relative error.

class.name: CATDynOperator
class.abstract: Abstract base class for the operators of filleting, drafting, chamfering, shelling and Boolean operations.

class.name: CATDynShell
class.abstract: Interface representing the topological operator of shell.

method.name: Append
method.abstract: Sets a list of faces with null internal and external offset values.

method.name: Append
method.abstract: Modifies the offset values for a list of faces of the body to shell.

class.name: CATDynSplit
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that splits a 3D body.

method.name: GetRelimitation
method.abstract: Indicates whether the Split Operation has removed some material to the body or not.

method.name: SetSplit
method.abstract: Defines the splitting body.

method.name: SetSplit
method.abstract: Defines the splitting plane.

method.name: SetSplit
method.abstract: Defines the splitting surface.

class.name: CATDynThickness
class.abstract: Interface representing the topological operator of thickness.

method.name: Append
method.abstract: Defines the offset value for a given list of faces of a body to thick.

method.name: SetDefaultOffsetValue
method.abstract: Defines the offset value that applies to all the body to thicken.

method.name: SetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Defines the state of the resulting body.

method.name: SetSharpBorderMode
method.abstract: Defines how borders are transformed in the neighborhood of sharp edges.

class.name: CATDynTransformation
class.abstract: Class representing the topological operator that transforms a CATBody.

method.name: SetAffinity
method.abstract: Defines <tt>this</tt> CATDynTransformation as an affinity.

method.name: SetJournalInfo
method.abstract: Defines whether a CATCGMJournalInfo has to be added to the item corresponding to <tt>this</tt> operation.

method.name: SetNewJournal
method.abstract: Defines another journal to be filled after another run of <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetReportMode
method.abstract: Defines the type of follow-up of the modifications to write in the journal.

method.name: SetRotation
method.abstract: Defines <tt>this</tt> CATDynTransformation as a rotation.

method.name: SetScaling
method.abstract: Defines <tt>this</tt> CATDynTransformation as a scaling.

method.name: SetSymmetry
method.abstract: Defines <tt>this</tt> CATDynTransformation as a symmetry.

method.name: SetTransformation
method.abstract: Sets to <tt>this</tt> CATDynTransformation the parameters of a given transformation.

method.name: SetTranslation
method.abstract: Defines <tt>this</tt> CATDynTransformation as a translation.

enum.name: CATDynReportMode
enum.abstract: Type of follow-up to be written in the journal.

class.name: CATExtrapolateBody
class.abstract: Class representing an operator that extrapolates 1D body (CATWire).

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the resulting body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetLimitToExtrapolate
method.abstract: Specifies the extrapolation length.

class.name: CATRemoveEdge
class.abstract: Class defining the topological operator that removes given Edges on a body.

method.name: GetAllTrickyEdges
method.abstract: Returns the list of CATEdge that couldn't be removed.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the resulting body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Defines the state of the resulting body.

method.name: SetPropagationMode
method.abstract: Mode de propagation en tangence : 1 = ON, 0 = OFF.

class.name: CATSkinExtrapol
class.abstract: Class representing an operator that extrapolates a shell body.

method.name: Append
method.abstract: Appends an edge to extrapolate.

method.name: Append
method.abstract: Appends a list of edges to extrapolate.

method.name: GetJournal
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the topological journal dedicated to <tt>this</tt> CATSkinExtrapol operator.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the resulting body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetDefaultExtrapolationValue
method.abstract: Selects all the edges of the shell boundary and sets to them a common extrapolation value.

method.name: SetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Sets the ability to later modify the resulting body.

method.name: SetPropagationMode
method.abstract: Defines the propagation mode of the extrapolation value.

class.name: CATSolidCuboid
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to create a topological cube.

class.name: CATSolidCylinder
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to create a topological cylinder.

class.name: CATSolidPyramid
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to create a topological pyramid.

class.name: CATSolidTorus
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to create a topological torus.

class.name: CATTopBodyExtremum
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that computes the point the furthest away from a given point in a given direction.

method.name: GetExtremum
method.abstract: Returns the distance between the origin and the extremum projection along the specified direction.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the created body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

class.name: CATTopCorner
class.abstract: Class representing the operator that computes a round corner between two wire bodies.

method.name: BeginningCorner
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the resulting corners.

method.name: GetCenterRadius
method.abstract: Returns the definition of the current corner.

method.name: GetCircleMode
method.abstract: Retrieves the relimitation mode of <tt>this</tt> corner operator.

method.name: GetCorner
method.abstract: Creates the current corner.

method.name: GetCurOrients
method.abstract: Retrieves the orientation of the parallels used to compute the center of the corner.

method.name: GetNumberOfCorners
method.abstract: Returns the number of computed corners.

method.name: GetOffsetOrientation
method.abstract: Retrieves the defined orientations to take for the parallels to the input wires.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns all the computed corners in a single body.

method.name: GetSupportTrimmingSideAndMode
method.abstract: Returns whether the input wires can be assembled in the resulting body, and how they can be assembled.

method.name: NextCorner
method.abstract: Skips to the next solution corner of <tt>this</tt> CATTopCorner operator.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetCircleMode
method.abstract: Defines the relimition mode of <tt>this</tt> corner operator.

method.name: SetOffsetOrientation
method.abstract: Defines the orientations to take for the parallels to the input wires.

method.name: SetSupportTrimmingSideAndMode
method.abstract: Defines whether the input wires can be assembled in the resulting body, and how they can be assembled.

class.name: CATTopDevelop
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that maps a wire on a shell onto another shell.

method.name: SetTargetInitialFace
method.abstract: Proposes a face of the target body on which the computed wire might pass.

class.name: CATTopExtrapolWireOpe
class.abstract: Class defining the topological operator to extrapol a wire.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the result of <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the resulting body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetContinuityType
method.abstract: Defines the type of continuity.

method.name: SetExtrapolLimit
method.abstract: Defines the extremity from which the extrapolation must start and the length of the extrapolation.

method.name: SetExtrapolLimit
method.abstract: Defines the extremity from which extrapolation must start and the body to reach.

method.name: SetNoSimplifOnLine
method.abstract: By default the result of the extrapolation of a line in tangency when no support is defined gives a body which only contains one edge.

class.name: CATTopExtrude
class.abstract: Base class for of all the topological operators doing extrusions.

method.name: CheckOperands
method.abstract: Checks the consistency of the input operands.

method.name: GetBooleanJournal
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the topological Boolean journal dedicated to <tt>this</tt> CATTopExtrude.

method.name: GetBooleanResult
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the body resulting from the Boolean operation between the extrusion and a trimming body.

method.name: GetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Returns the mode in which the resulting body is created.

method.name: IsResultInvariant
method.abstract: Tests whether the trimming body is touched by the Boolean operation.

method.name: SetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Defines the state of the resulting body.

method.name: SetOperation
method.abstract: Asks for a Boolean operation between the extruded body and another (called trimming) body.

method.name: SetProfileClosure
method.abstract: Asks for the closure of the profile on a given body.

method.name: SetResultMode
method.abstract: Defines the type of result to be output for <tt>this</tt> CATTopExtrude operator.

method.name: SetSimplification
method.abstract: Defines the simplication mode.

method.name: SetTrim
method.abstract: Defines the triming body.

class.name: CATTopPrism
class.abstract: Class representing the topological operator that creates a prism.

method.name: GetLength
method.abstract: Retrieves the main features of the created prism.

method.name: SetExtrudeLimit
method.abstract: Defines the type of limitation of each extremity along the extrusion (center curve) direction.

method.name: SetExtrudeLimit
method.abstract: Defines the type of limitation of each extremity along the extrusion (center curve) direction.

class.name: CATTopReflectLine
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that computes the reflect lines on a skin body.

method.name: OptimizeDomainStructure
method.abstract: Use this method before the Run() method in order to have a better associativity of the CATTopReflectLine result.

class.name: CATTopRevol
class.abstract: Class representing the topological operator that revolves a profile.

method.name: GetLength
method.abstract: Retrieves the main features of the created revolution.

method.name: SetExtrudeLimit
method.abstract: Defines the type of limitation of each extremity along the extrusion (center curve) direction.

method.name: SetExtrudeLimit
method.abstract: Defines the type of limitation of each extremity along the extrusion (center curve) direction.

method.name: SetProfileClosureLimit
method.abstract: Defines the type of limitation of each extremity along the profile.

method.name: SetProfileClosureLimit
method.abstract: Defines the type of limitation of each extremity along the profile.

class.name: CATTopSimplify
class.abstract: Class representing the operator that simplifies a whole body or selected cells of a body.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the resulting body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetCellsToRemove
method.abstract: Defines the cells to remove during simplification.

method.name: SetCellsToSimplify
method.abstract: Defines the cells to simplify.

method.name: SetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Defines the state of the resulting body.

class.name: CATTopSweepSkinSkinSegment
class.abstract: Class defining the topological operator that creates a sweep between a two skin bodies.

method.name: GetResultInformation
method.abstract: Retrieves the signature relative to the current resulting body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetFirstCoupledOrientation
method.abstract: Defines the signature of the desired results with regards to the first coulped orientation.

method.name: SetFirstShellOrientation
method.abstract: Defines the signature of the desired results with regards to the first skin orientation.

method.name: SetSecondCoupledOrientation
method.abstract: Defines the signature of the desired results with regards to the second coulped orientation.

method.name: SetSecondShellOrientation
method.abstract: Defines the signature of the desired results with regards to the second skin orientation.

class.name: CATTopSweepWireSkin
class.abstract: Class defining the topological operator that creates a sweep between a skin body and a wire body.

method.name: GetResultInformation
method.abstract: Retrieves the signature relative to the current resulting body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetGuideOrientation
method.abstract: Defines the signature of the desired results with regards to the wire orientation.

method.name: SetShellOrientation
method.abstract: Defines the signature of the desired results with regards to the skin orientation.

class.name: CATTopSweepWireSkinCircle
class.abstract: Class defining the topological operator that creates a sweep between a skin body and a wire body.

class.name: CATTopTangentCurveOperator
class.abstract: Class of the topological operators that create the bodies tangent to other bodies.

method.name: GetCurvatureOrientation
method.abstract: Returns the curvature orientation of the resulting line bodie.

method.name: GetDiscriminationIndex
method.abstract: Defines an index to distinguish the current resulting line body.

method.name: GetOrientationOnWire
method.abstract: Defines the orientation of the current resulting line body.

method.name: GetResultWithConditions
method.abstract: Creates the nearest line from conditions.

method.name: GetTangentOrientation
method.abstract: Returns the tangent orientation of the current resulting line body.

method.name: SetCurvatureOrientation
method.abstract: Defines the curvature orientation of the resulting line bodies to output.

method.name: SetTangentOrientation
method.abstract: Defines the tangent orientation of the resulting line bodies to output.

class.name: CATWireExtrapolationOp
class.abstract: Class defining the extrapolation operator on a wire body.

method.name: GetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Returns the freeze mode of <tt>this</tt> CATWireExtrapolationOp.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the resulting CATBody of <tt>this</tt> CATWireExtrapolationOp.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> CATWireExtrapolationOp.

method.name: SetExtrapolation
method.abstract: Set extrapolation length for specified vertex.

method.name: SetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Modifies the freeze mode of <tt>this</tt> CATWireExtrapolationOp.

define.name: CATTopSweepWireSkinSegment
define.abstract: Constructs an operator that creates a segment sweep between a skin body and a wire body.

function.name: CATCreateCloseOperator
function.abstract: Creates an operator that closes a skin body.

function.name: CATCreateDirBodyExtremum
function.abstract: Creates the operator that computes the point(s) the furthest away from a given point in a given direction.

function.name: CATCreateDynBoolean
function.abstract: Creates a CATDynBoolean operator.

function.name: CATCreateDynChamfer
function.abstract: Creates a CATDynChamfer operator.

function.name: CATCreateDynDraft
function.abstract: Creates a CATDynDraft operator.

function.name: CATCreateDynFillet
function.abstract: Creates a CATDynFillet operator.

function.name: CATCreateDynShell
function.abstract: Creates a CATDynShell operator.

function.name: CATCreateDynSplit
function.abstract: Creates a CATDynSplit operator.

function.name: CATCreateDynThickness
function.abstract: Creates a CATDynThickness operator.

function.name: CATCreateDynTransformation
function.abstract: Creates a CATDynTransformation.

function.name: CATCreateExtrapolateBody
function.abstract: Creates a CATExtrapolateBody operator.

function.name: CATCreateRemoveFace
function.abstract: Creates a CATRemoveFace operator.

function.name: CATCreateSkinExtrapol
function.abstract: Creates a skin extrapolation operator.

function.name: CATCreateTopCorner
function.abstract: Creates a CATTopCorner operator that computes a rounded corner between two wires lying on a shell domain.

function.name: CATCreateTopDevelop
function.abstract: Creates an operator that maps a wire on a shell onto a wire on another shell.

function.name: CATCreateTopDevelop
function.abstract: Creates an operator that maps a wire on a shell onto a wire on another shell.

function.name: CATCreateTopExtrapolWireOpe
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator that extrapolates a wire.

function.name: CATCreateTopPattern
function.abstract: Creates a CATTopPattern operator from a set of faces to pattern.

function.name: CATCreateTopPattern
function.abstract: Creates a CATTopPattern operator with a body to pattern.

function.name: CATCreateTopPrism
function.abstract: Creates a CATTopPrism operator.

function.name: CATCreateTopReflectLine
function.abstract: Creates the operator to compute the CONICAL reflect lines on a skin body.

function.name: CATCreateTopReflectLine
function.abstract: Creates the operator to compute the CYLINDRICAL reflect lines on a skin body.

function.name: CATCreateTopRevol
function.abstract: Creates a CATTopRevol operator.

function.name: CATCreateTopSimplify
function.abstract: Creates a CATTopSimplify operator.

function.name: CATCreateTopSweepSkinSkinSegment
function.abstract: Creates a CATTopSweepSkinSkinSegment operator.

function.name: CATCreateTopSweepWireSkinSegment
function.abstract: Creates a CATTopSweepWireSkinSegment operator.

function.name: CATCreateWireExtrapolationOp
function.abstract: Creates a CATWireExtrapolationOp operator.

function.name: CATDynCreateMassProperties3D
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that computes geometric characteristics of a face.

function.name: CATDynCreateMassProperties3D
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that computes geometric characteristics of a edge.

function.name: CATDynCreateMassProperties3D
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that computes geometric characteristics of a body.

function.name: CATLoadCATExtrapolateBody
function.abstract: Creates a CATExtrapolateBody operator from a CGMReplay file.

function.name: CATTopCreateSolidCuboid
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that creates a topological cube.

function.name: CATTopCreateSolidCylinder
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that creates a topological cylinder.

function.name: CATTopCreateSolidCylinder
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that creates a topological cylinder.

function.name: CATTopCreateSolidPyramid
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that creates a topological pyramid.

function.name: CATTopCreateSolidPyramid
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that creates a topological pyramid.

function.name: CATTopCreateSolidTorus
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that creates a topological torus.

class.name: CATRemoveFace
class.abstract: Class defining a topological operator which removes a set of faces from a volume or a skin.

method.name: Append
method.abstract: Appends a list of faces to be removed.

method.name: AppendLimiting
method.abstract: Restricts the removal of a face to a portion delimited by a single-face skin.

method.name: GetAllTrickyFaces
method.abstract: Returns the complete list of faces when the operation cannot complete.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the resulting body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Defines the "Freeze" mode of the resulting body.

class.name: CATTopPattern
class.abstract: Class dedicated to pattern operations.

method.name: SetCirPattern
method.abstract: Defines a canonical circular pattern.

method.name: SetRectPattern
method.abstract: Defines a canonical rectangular pattern.

method.name: SimplifyTool
method.abstract: Removes the internal faces between the body to be patterned and the support body.
